name: Aim Speed Test
description:
I can't say much about this game, but I just made so people could test their aiming skills and try to improve it.

If this game got 10 downloads in the next month I'll add a sensitivity controller and some effects to the explosion of the targets and maybe some exciting words after hitting specific amounts of points through out the game's time.

Thank you for wasting your time to read this, and I hope we can help each other. :)
